page.title: 19Lonsdale and Thomas.
page.content: {L. & T. is a Cash & Carry warehouse where food and certain dry goods can be bought in bulk by people from small shops, restaurants, hotels, schools on production of a indentification card. Goods delivered by warehouse lorry- booking system for each firm. Off load goods onto wooden palettes, priced. then transfered to shelves by trolley. Often packaged in 12's and shrink wrapped.{Separate Provisions room- cold- to store dairy produce,e.g. butter, cheese, cold meats etc. {Separate Butchers shop}and several large freezers to store frozen food. There are security cameras and alarm system in case of fire.Scaffolding on wheels is used to change lights because of height.Customers collect goods on trollies & pay at Check out. 'Caller' transfers goods & gives price to cashier.{Workforce of 30.
